input.sentences: at the town | we found a man on a horse .
he led us to this beautiful building .
we parted and then marched to the top of the city 's hill .
my friend laid on the hill and i took a picture of him .
we ended our day at this fancy room .
output.sentences: i felt like taking pictures today so i walked around to find stuff. found a horse.
then i found a nice building with the sun creeping over it
saw some people on a nice hill framed by the sun
one of my friends laying down on a hill for me
we broke into an old abandoned theater.
